column4: What is your current level of education?
column5: Do you have access to a mobile device?
column6: Do you currently use any form of health tracking app (eg: Strava, Nike Run Club, Apple Fitness)?
column7: What are some features offered by these health tracking apps that you enjoy?
column8: How often do you use health tracking apps to track your physical activities/habits?
column9: What difficulties do you face in staying motivated to use health tracking apps consistently and regularly?
column10: What is the main reason for not using health tracking apps to track your physical activities/habits?
column11: How would you describe your attitude towards maintaining a healthy lifestyle?
column12: Which health or fitness goal is most significant to you?
column13: How often do you engage in physical exercise (eg: sports, running, walking)?
column14: What is your favourite physical activity (eg: sports, exercises, hobbies)?
column15: What are the top 3 motivations for your participation in physical activities?
column16: What types of rewards or incentives would encourage you to use an app regularly?
column17: What types of content in a health tracking app would be most appealing to you?
column18: To what extent does the presence of a social community aspect influence your app usage?
column19: Select the top three gamification features that would be most appealing to you in a health tracking app
column20: How much would you prefer to have game-based features in your apps?
column21: How much would you prefer to have challenge-based features in your apps?
column22: What features would make you more likely to participate in community events or challenges within the app?
column23: How likely are you to participate in family-based challenges or activities within a health tracking app?
column24: To what extent would you be more inclined to use a health tracking app if it was incorporated into school curriculum?
column25: How do you think schools could help promote health tracking apps (eg: H365) among students?
column26: To what extent do you value personalised features in health tracking apps, such as tailored recommendations and content?
column27: Which types of personalised health recommendations would you find most useful?
column28: How important is it for you that a health tracking app adapts its recommendations and content to align with your specific health goals and activity data?
column29: How likely are you to follow health recommendations if they are tailored to your specific goals and activity levels?
column30: Agreement
